comments:
Preview tab in Designer renders with no errors, and appears to work correctly.  Run servlet with format=__html creates consistent output.  Frameset servlet is correct, but has the following error:  

Error0 : Error.UnhandledScriptError ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: Unhandled exception when executing script at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.script.internal.ScriptExecutor.addException(ScriptExecutor.java:228) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.script.internal.ScriptExecutor.addException(ScriptExecutor.java:218) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.script.internal.CellScriptExecutor.handleOnRender(CellScriptExecutor.java:80) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.LocalizedEmitter.startCell(LocalizedEmitter.java:284) at ...

PDF is severely messed up, no error shown.  PDF appears to render group headers improperly, showing twice in the report example.  Page breaks in PDF are random.  

Only scripting in the report is on queryText to use series of parameters.  Query works fine.

Files showing the example output will be uploaded.

Tested in RC1, same problems.
I replaced page breaks I had set in text elements with page breaks in the properties of header rows of the table.  This cures one of the PDF problems, but still I think it should render the same way in HTML and PDF.

I tried to resolve the page break in the middle of the table, but could not fix it.  I put in avoid page breaks inside the table, but it didn't fix it.  I reset the page break interval to -1, and it still didn't work.

I am posting revised report file and pdf results.
